body_html:
cost = tf.losses.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy(labels=y,logits=logits, weights=tf.ones(40,dtype=tf.float32))

labels should be y_t in this line I think. y is type int32, which is causing the error.
body_text:
cost = tf.losses.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy(labels=y,logits=logits, weights=tf.ones(40,dtype=tf.float32))

labels should be y_t in this line I think. y is type int32, which is causing the error.
body:
```
cost = tf.losses.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy(labels=y,logits=logits, weights=tf.ones(40,dtype=tf.float32))
```
labels should be `y_t` in this line I think. `y` is type int32, which is causing the error.
